ResearchProjectDef.label: smokeleaf cultivation
ResearchProjectDef.description: The process of seperating the parts of the Smokeleaf plant. Produces Smokeleaf buds, seeds and hemp fibers. Allows joints to be rolled.

ResearchProjectDef.label: hemp processing
ResearchProjectDef.description: After a bit a of research, uses for the scrap materials of smokeleaf are devised.

ResearchProjectDef.label: smokeleaf edibles
ResearchProjectDef.description: Through trial and error, methods of cooking with smokeleaf have hinted at medicinal benefits.

ResearchProjectDef.label: industrial smokeleaf cultivation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Industrial processing is now possible. The cultivation table is developed, as well as a cost efficient grow lamp.

ResearchProjectDef.label: industrial hemp processing
ResearchProjectDef.description: A new fuel and building material are created from the fibers and seeds of smokeleaf.

ResearchProjectDef.label: smokeleaf extracts
ResearchProjectDef.description: Basic methods of extracting and concentrating the psychactive indgredients in smokeleaf.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced smokeleaf processing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Our engineers have developed new machinery to aid in the growth and processing of smokeleaf.

ResearchProjectDef.label: smokeleaf pharmacology
ResearchProjectDef.description: Researchers isolate the beneficial compounds of Smokeleaf and are able to apply them in modern medical methods with no ill side effects.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced smokeleaf extracts and edibles
ResearchProjectDef.description: Safer, more efficient ways of extracting the medicinal parts of smokeleaf are developed. Because of this stronger edibles are now possible.
